verses.verse: נַחֲמ֥וּ <WH5162> Comfort נַחֲמ֖וּ <WH5162> ye comfort עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> ye my people יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> saith אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

דַּבְּר֞וּ <WH1696> Speak עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֤ב <WH3820> ye comfortably יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> to Jerusalem וְקִרְא֣וּ <WH7121> and cry אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מָֽלְאָה֙ <WH4390> is accomplished צְבָאָ֔הּ <WH6635> unto her that her warfare כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִרְצָ֖ה <WH7521> is pardoned עֲוֹנָ֑הּ <WH5771> that her iniquity כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לָקְחָה֙ <WH3947> for she hath received מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God כִּפְלַ֖יִם <WH3718> double בְּכָל־ <WH3605> for all חַטֹּאתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2403> for all her sins ס

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> The voice קוֹרֵ֔א <WH7121> of him that crieth בַּמִּדְבָּ֕ר <WH4057> in the wilderness פַּנּ֖וּ <WH6437> Prepare דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> ye the way יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD יַשְּׁרוּ֙ <WH3474> make straight בָּעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> in the desert מְסִלָּ֖ה <WH4546> a highway לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> for our God

כָּל־ <WH3605> every גֶּיא֙ <WH1516> Every valley יִנָּשֵׂ֔א <WH5375> shall be exalted וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הַ֥ר <WH2022> and every mountain וְגִבְעָ֖ה <WH1389> and hill יִשְׁפָּ֑לוּ <WH8213> shall be made low וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become הֶֽעָקֹב֙ <WH6121> and the crooked לְמִישׁ֔וֹר <WH4334> shall be made straight וְהָרְכָסִ֖ים <WH7406> and the rough places לְבִקְעָֽה׃ <WH1237> plain

וְנִגְלָ֖ה <WH1540> shall be revealed כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> And the glory יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְרָא֤וּ <WH7200> shall see כָל־ <WH3605> and all בָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> and all flesh יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> [it] together כִּ֛י <WH3588> For פִּ֥י <WH6310> for the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken ס

ק֚וֹל <WH6963> The voice אֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> said קְרָ֔א <WH7121> Cry וְאָמַ֖ר <WH559> And he said מָ֣ה <WH4100> What אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> What shall I cry כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַבָּשָׂ֣ר <WH1320> ? All flesh חָצִ֔יר <WH2682> [is] grass וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חַסְדּ֖וֹ <WH2617> and all the goodliness כְּצִ֥יץ <WH6731> thereof [is] as the flower הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

יָבֵ֤שׁ <WH3001> withereth חָצִיר֙ <WH2682> The grass נָ֣בֵֽל <WH5034> fadeth צִ֔יץ <WH6731> the flower כִּ֛י <WH3588> When ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> because the spirit יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD נָ֣שְׁבָה <WH5380> bloweth בּ֑וֹ אָכֵ֥ן <WH403> upon it surely חָצִ֖יר <WH2682> [is] grass הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

יָבֵ֥שׁ <WH3001> withereth חָצִ֖יר <WH2682> The grass נָ֣בֵֽל <WH5034> fadeth צִ֑יץ <WH6731> the flower וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> but the word אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> of our God יָק֥וּם <WH6965> shall stand לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever ס

עַ֣ל <WH5921> and הַר־ <WH2022> mountain גָּבֹ֤הַ <WH1364> into the high עֲלִי־ <WH5927> get thee up לָךְ֙ מְבַשֶּׂ֣רֶת <WH1319> that bringest good tidings צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> O Zion הָרִ֤ימִי <WH7311> lift up בַכֹּ֙חַ֙ <WH3581> with strength קוֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH6963> thy voice מְבַשֶּׂ֖רֶת <WH1319> that bringest good tidings יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> O Jerusalem הָרִ֙ימִי֙ <WH7311> lift [it] up אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֔אִי <WH3372> be not afraid אִמְרִי֙ <WH559> say לְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> unto the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> Here אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> Behold your God

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֲדֹנָ֤י <WH136> Behold the Lord יְהוִה֙ <WH3069> GOD בְּחָזָ֣ק <WH2389> with strong יָב֔וֹא <WH935> will come וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> [hand] and his arm מֹ֣שְׁלָה <WH4910> shall rule ל֑וֹ הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold שְׂכָרוֹ֙ <WH7939> for him behold his reward אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וּפְעֻלָּת֖וֹ <WH6468> [is] with him and his work לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

כְּרֹעֶה֙ <WH7462> He shall feed עֶדְר֣וֹ <WH5739> his flock יִרְעֶ֔ה <WH7462> like a shepherd בִּזְרֹעוֹ֙ <WH2220> with his arm יְקַבֵּ֣ץ <WH6908> he shall gather טְלָאִ֔ים <WH2922> the lambs וּבְחֵיק֖וֹ <WH2436> [them] in his bosom יִשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> and carry עָל֖וֹת <WH5763> those that are with young יְנַהֵֽל׃ <WH5095> [and] shall gently lead ס

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who מָדַ֨ד <WH4058> Who hath measured בְּשָׁעֳל֜וֹ <WH8168> in the hollow of his hand מַ֗יִם <WH4325> the waters וְשָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> heaven בַּזֶּ֣רֶת <WH2239> with the span תִּכֵּ֔ן <WH8505> and meted out וְכָ֥ל <WH3557> and comprehended בַּשָּׁלִ֖שׁ <WH7991> in a measure עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְשָׁקַ֤ל <WH8254> and weighed בַּפֶּ֙לֶס֙ <WH6425> in scales הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> the mountains וּגְבָע֖וֹת <WH1389> and the hills בְּמֹאזְנָֽיִם׃ <WH3976> pair of scales

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who תִכֵּ֥ן <WH8505> Who hath directed אֶת־ <WH853> ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> the Spirit יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> he עֲצָת֖וֹ <WH6098> advice יוֹדִיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3045> hath taught

אֶת־ <WH854> With מִ֤י <WH4310> whom נוֹעָץ֙ <WH3289> With whom took he counsel וַיְבִינֵ֔הוּ <WH995> and [who] instructed וַֽיְלַמְּדֵ֖הוּ <WH3925> him and taught בְּאֹ֣רַח <WH734> him in the path מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> of judgment וַיְלַמְּדֵ֣הוּ <WH3925> and taught דַ֔עַת <WH1847> him knowledge וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> to him the way תְּבוּנ֖וֹת <WH8394> fruit יוֹדִיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3045> and shewed

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> Behold the nations כְּמַ֣ר <WH4752> [are] as a drop מִדְּלִ֔י <WH1805> of a bucket וּכְשַׁ֥חַק <WH7834> as the small dust מֹאזְנַ֖יִם <WH3976> of the balance נֶחְשָׁ֑בוּ <WH2803> and are counted הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold אִיִּ֖ים <WH339> the isles כַּדַּ֥ק <WH1851> as a very little thing יִטּֽוֹל׃ <WH5190> behold he taketh up

וּלְבָנ֕וֹן <WH3844> And Lebanon אֵ֥ין <WH369> [is] not דֵּ֖י <WH1767> sufficient בָּעֵ֑ר <WH1197> to burn וְחַיָּת֔וֹ <WH2416> nor the beasts אֵ֥ין <WH369> Nor דֵּ֖י <WH1767> thereof sufficient עוֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering ס

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> All nations כְּאַ֣יִן <WH369> nothing נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <WH5048> before מֵאֶ֥פֶס <WH657> to him less than nothing וָתֹ֖הוּ <WH8414> and vanity נֶחְשְׁבוּ־ <WH2803> before him [are] as nothing and they are counted לֽוֹ׃
וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מִ֖י <WH4310> whom תְּדַמְּי֣וּן <WH1819> To whom then will ye liken אֵ֑ל <WH410> God וּמַה־ <WH4100> how long דְּמ֖וּת <WH1823> likeness תַּ֥עַרְכוּ <WH6186> will ye compare לֽוֹ׃

הַפֶּ֙סֶל֙ <WH6459> a graven image נָסַ֣ךְ <WH5258> melteth חָרָ֔שׁ <WH2796> The workman וְצֹרֵ֖ף <WH6884> and the goldsmith בַּזָּהָ֣ב <WH2091> it over with gold יְרַקְּעֶ֑נּוּ <WH7554> spreadeth וּרְתֻק֥וֹת <WH7577> chains כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> silver צוֹרֵֽף׃ <WH6884> and casteth

הַֽמְסֻכָּ֣ן <WH5533> endanger תְּרוּמָ֔ה <WH8641> that he hath no oblation עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> a tree לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִרְקַ֖ב <WH7537> [that] will not rot יִבְחָ֑ר <WH977> chooseth חָרָ֤שׁ <WH2796> workman חָכָם֙ <WH2450> unto him a cunning יְבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> he seeketh ל֔וֹ לְהָכִ֥ין <WH3559> to prepare פֶּ֖סֶל <WH6459> a graven image לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> [that] shall not be moved

הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not תֵֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> Have ye not known הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not תִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <WH8085> ? have ye not heard הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> not הֻגַּ֥ד <WH5046> ? hath it not been told מֵרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> band לָכֶ֑ם הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not הֲבִ֣ינֹתֶ֔ם <WH995> attend מוֹסְד֖וֹת <WH4146> from the foundations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> who

הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> [It is] he that sitteth עַל־ <WH5921> above ח֣וּג <WH2329> upon the circle הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <WH3427> and the inhabitants כַּחֲגָבִ֑ים <WH2284> thereof [are] as grasshoppers הַנּוֹטֶ֤ה <WH5186> that stretcheth out כַדֹּק֙ <WH1852> as a curtain שָׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> the heavens וַיִּמְתָּחֵ֥ם <WH4969> and spreadeth them out כָּאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> as a tent לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> to dwell in

הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> That bringeth רוֹזְנִ֖ים <WH7336> the princes לְאָ֑יִן <WH369> to nothing שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <WH8199> the judges אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כַּתֹּ֥הוּ <WH8414> as vanity עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> to nothing he maketh

אַ֣ף <WH637> yet בַּל־ <WH1077> lest נִטָּ֗עוּ <WH5193> Yea they shall not be planted אַ֚ף <WH637> yet בַּל־ <WH1077> lest זֹרָ֔עוּ <WH2232> yea they shall not be sown אַ֛ף <WH637> yet בַּל־ <WH1077> lest שֹׁרֵ֥שׁ <WH8327> shall not take root בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the earth גִּזְעָ֑ם <WH1503> yea their stock וְגַם־ <WH1571> merely נָשַׁ֤ף <WH5398> and he shall also blow בָּהֶם֙ וַיִּבָ֔שׁוּ <WH3001> upon them and they shall wither וּסְעָרָ֖ה <WH5591> and the whirlwind כַּקַּ֥שׁ <WH7179> them away as stubble תִּשָּׂאֵֽם׃ <WH5375> shall take ס
וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מִ֥י <WH4310> whom תְדַמְּי֖וּנִי <WH1819> To whom then will ye liken וְאֶשְׁוֶ֑ה <WH7737> me or shall I be equal יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> ? saith קָדֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH6918> the Holy One

שְׂאוּ־ <WH5375> Lift up מָר֨וֹם <WH4791> on high עֵינֵיכֶ֤ם <WH5869> your eyes וּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and behold מִי־ <WH4310> who בָרָ֣א <WH1254> who hath created אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> these [things] that bringeth out בְמִסְפָּ֖ר <WH4557> by number צְבָאָ֑ם <WH6635> their host לְכֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> all בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> them all by names יִקְרָ֔א <WH7121> he calleth מֵרֹ֤ב <WH7230> by the greatness אוֹנִים֙ <WH202> of his might וְאַמִּ֣יץ <WH533> for that [he is] strong כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> in power אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> not one לֹ֥א <WH3808> before נֶעְדָּֽר׃ <WH5737> faileth ס

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תֹאמַר֙ <WH559> Why sayest יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> thou O Jacob וּתְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and speakest יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> O Israel נִסְתְּרָ֤ה <WH5641> is hid דַרְכִּי֙ <WH1870> My way מֵיְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> from the LORD וּמֵאֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> angels מִשְׁפָּטִ֥י <WH4941> and my judgment יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <WH5674> is passed over

הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not יָדַ֜עְתָּ <WH3045> Hast thou not known אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֣א <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <WH8085> ? hast thou not heard אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> God עוֹלָ֤ם ׀ <WH5769> [that] the everlasting יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD בּוֹרֵא֙ <WH1254> the Creator קְצ֣וֹת <WH7098> of the ends הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יִיעַ֖ף <WH3286> fainteth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִיגָ֑ע <WH3021> not neither is weary אֵ֥ין <WH369> no חֵ֖קֶר <WH2714> ? [there is] no searching לִתְבוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8394> of his understanding

נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> He giveth לַיָּעֵ֖ף <WH3287> to the faint כֹּ֑חַ <WH3581> power וּלְאֵ֥ין <WH369> lacks אוֹנִ֖ים <WH202> and to [them that have] no might עָצְמָ֥ה <WH6109> strength יַרְבֶּֽה׃ <WH7235> he increaseth

וְיִֽעֲפ֥וּ <WH3286> shall faint נְעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> Even the youths וְיִגָ֑עוּ <WH3021> and be weary וּבַחוּרִ֖ים <WH970> and the young men כָּשׁ֥וֹל <WH3782> shall utterly יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃ <WH3782> fall

וְקוֹיֵ֤ <WH6960> But they that wait יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> upon the LORD יַחֲלִ֣יפוּ <WH2498> shall renew כֹ֔חַ <WH3581> [their] strength יַעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> they shall mount up אֵ֖בֶר <WH83> with wings כַּנְּשָׁרִ֑ים <WH5404> as eagles יָר֙וּצוּ֙ <WH7323> they shall run וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יִיגָ֔עוּ <WH3021> and not be weary יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> will walk וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not יִיעָֽפוּ׃ <WH3286> and not faint פ
